item.title: Tetris Skaters
Voted most likely time waster - Fall 2009
Monkey Island I remade as a Flash Movie
item.description: Forgot some of the plot details of this classic adventure game? Get a quick and humorous reminder with this awesome flash movie. I just realized my two most memorable childhood games involve pirates and ninjas. Guess you can't go wrong with ninjas and pirates.

item.title: Last Ninja on the WII
item.description:
Nintendo has started offering C64 titles on the WII, and one of the launch titles are one of my all time favorite games, The Last Ninja. I just spent way too much time getting through that swamp. If you don't know what it's all about, you can check out this long play video.

Another launch title is International Karate, which was arguably my first exposure to Versus Fighting Games, a category that have consumed more of my time than any others, with game series like Street Fighter and Tekken. I did buy Street Fighter IV when it was released on friday, but it hasn't been able to wrestle my attention away from Tekken V Online.

item.title: Lucasarts Posters.
item.description:
If you are anything like me, a large part of your misspent youth occurred in front of a monitor, playing various games. For me and many of my friends the best games ever were Monkey Island and other Lucasarts adventure games. If that was the case for you, I'm sure you be excited at this opportunity to print and frame your very own full-size LucasArts game poster!

Now I just need to convince my S.O. somehow that this is fine art. :-)

item.title: Flash version of the awesome arcade game QIX
‹‹A vampire story›› now out for the mac.
item.description: Too bad the the game is plagued by the most annoying sense of humor ever. I suggest getting World of Goo instead if you are looking for a new game to play on your mac.
